entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries near noon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
